DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether new vectorcardiogram ( VCG ) analysis facilitate detection significant coronary disease ( CAD ) patient normal rest 12-leads ECG ( NE ) .
DOC.brief_title: New Vectorcardiogram Analysis Good Predictor Coronary Disease Patients With Normal Rest 12-leads ECG
DOC.detailed_description: Patients NE undergo coronary angiography routine indication . Prior angiography computerize simultaneous multi-leads ECG record , use new dedicate algorithm 3D electrical activity reconstruction , investigator plot horizontal VCG whole ECG cycle . Using new VCG analysis determine whether patient normal coronary artery coronary disease .
DOC.criteria: Patients normal rest 12leads ECG Patients significant irregular heart beat Patients heart failure
